690430.name: RPG Maker MV - Parallel Worlds Character Pack
690430.description:
From the creators of Fantasy Heroine Character Pack comes another set of fantastic heroes.

Modern world and fantasy collide in Parallel Worlds character pack! This hefty set includes all the graphics you'll need to create a full party of male heroes (or villains!) for your RPG Maker projects. From walking sprites to faces with emotions and portrait busts, Parallel Worlds is your go-to hero set and a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker MV resources.

Features:
  • 8 unique characters, with a modern and fantasy outfit for a total of 16 characters.
  • Matching walking sprites, static front-view actor enemies and animated side-view actors.
  • Facesets and portrait busts with emotion expressions.
  • BONUS: Large full-body portraits of each character.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
690430.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
